text: Roger Hegi (born 28 February 1956) is a retired Swiss football midfielder and later manager.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Aarau players Category:FC Luzern players Category:FC St. Gallen players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Swiss football managers Category:FC St. Gallen managers Category:Grasshopper Club Zürich managers
title: Roger Hegi
